instance_template: loc("A"; "B"; "C"; "D"; "E"). edge("A", "B"). edge("A", "C"). edge("B", "D"). edge("C", "E"). deliver_to("D"; "E"). time(0..6).

hard_constraints.description: Sanity check to make sure the bot doesn't teleport; it can only move between spots that are actually connected.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- at(L1, T), at(L2, T+1), not edge(L1, L2), not edge(L2, L1), time(T).

hard_constraints.description: Hardcode the start point so the bot doesn't just spawn wherever it wants at T=0.
The bot's gotta hit every delivery site exactly once. No skipping and no camping at the destination.
